title: Beverley man held without bail in fatal shooting of friend
content:
SALEM, Mass. — A 19-year-old Beverly man has been held without bail following fatal shooting that his attorney says was accidental.
Justice Galarza has been charged in the shooting death of 21-year-old Christian Merced, of Miami, Florida.
Police responded to an apartment on Ropes Street at about 10:30 p.m. Saturday and found Merced, who was visiting family members in the area, suffering a gunshot wound to the chest.
Galarza initially fled the scene but later turned himself in to police, who recovered the weapon around some nearby railroad tracks.
